name: Robo Wars (Pre Alpha)
description:
GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS IN PRE ALPHA

Hi,

Thanks for checking out my game.

I am Aniruddha. I'm an Indie game developer. I just started learning game dev and this is my first game. I created this project on itch so I can get feedback from the community and to get the motivation to complete the game.

Robo War is a 2D multiplayer shooter game, made using unity and photon networking engine.
